admin.config: The config setting *{0}* has been changed to *{1}*!
admin.status_not_allowed: {user_mention}, you can't say what I'll say.
admin.status_incorrect: {user_mention}, that's not a valid activity type!
birthday.how_to:
{user_mention}, you didn't give a date for me to set as your birthday.
Typing `.birthday set 18 june 1993` is an example on how to do properly!
birthday.incorrect: {user_mention}, is that a date? I don't think so. Typing `.birthday set 18 june 1993` is an example on how to do properly!
birthday.not_set: You need to set a birthday first using the `.birthday set` command, {user_mention}!
birthday.succes: {user_mention}, I have set your birthday to {0} in the timezone {1}.
birthday.timezone:
{user_mention}, You need to tell me which timezone, Europe/Paris for example.
Go to http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone if you don't know your timezone or how to type it!
birthday.timezone_set: {user_mention}, I have set your timezone to {0}!
birthday.timezone_unknown: {user_mention}, I don't know that timezone, go check http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone to find the right one!
birthday.wish:
Hey @everyone, it's the birthday of {0} today!
Be a friendly person and say happy birthday would you?
events.error: An error has occured. The error message has been sent to the bot owner, thanks for being a crash-dummy {user_mention}!
events.missing_argument: You're using this command incorrect {user_mention}, an argument is missing.
events.no_permission: You're not allowed to use this command, {user_mention}!
events.no_private_message: This command cannot be used in private message.
groups.already_exist: A group with that name already exist, {user_mention}!
groups.created: Group {0} has been created! Everyone can join it now if they want.
groups.left: You're no longer a member of the {0} group, {user_mention}!
groups.joined: You're now part of the {0} group, {user_mention}!
groups.no_groups: {user_mention}, I would love to show some groups for you to join, but there are none...
groups.no_members: {user_mention}, I would love to mention that group but it has no members, so it's useless...
groups.list.description: Below is a list of groups which you can join by using `.group join`. Once you've joined a group, you can mention everyone or be mentioned by `@group <name>`.
groups.list.title: **Groups.**
info.description: Open-source Discord bot for providing moderation features, music features and other fun commands to a Discord server.
info.honk: That took me {0} miliseconds. I'm pro.
info.title: **Information.**
music.not_in_same_channel: {user_mention}, we're not in the same channel!
music.playlist: Here is the playlist I'm following now...
music.playlist.end:
And that is the end of the playlist.
   Use .play to add something to it!
music.playlist.nothing: There's no playlist for me to play, this is the last song! Go add something using .play if you want.
music.queued:
{user_mention}, your song is #{0} in the queue. I will play it over roughly {1}...
The song I'll play is **{2}**.
music.too_long: {user_mention}, no, I'm not going to play longer than {0} seconds.
music.user_not_in_channel: Get first in a channel yourself, {user_mention}!
music.volume: Oke, I'll play now at {0}% volume.
polls.continuation: Here are the rest of the options for the poll above...
polls.next_post: I'll consider your next message as a poll, {user_mention}! Make sure to use the A, B, C, etc. emoji's for options. By the way, I have deleted your message and will delete mine within 10 seconds.
polls.not_a_poll: That's not a poll, {0}! Where are the emoji's like A, B, C, etc.?
